title: 1st School Term (Phase Two) from Monday (6)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The second phase of the first term of Government and Government approved private schools begins on Monday (6).
The Ministry of Education said that the holiday period for the first phase of the first school term ended on Sunday (5).
Meanwhile, the Department of Examinations said that the evaluation of G.C.E Ordinary Level Examination answer scripts will commence on the 17th of June.
The Commissioner General of Examinations L.M.D Dharmasena said that the results of the 2021 G.C.E Advanced Level Examination are expected to be released by end of July 2022.
‘Motorcycle Murderers’ claim 5th life in 5 days, in Sri Lanka.
